com.whatsapp.api.impl

类 WhatsappEngagelabApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whatsapp.api.impl.WhatsappEngagelabApi

  • public class WhatsappEngagelabApi
extends Object
    Implementation of WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API with synchronous/blocking method calls.
    另请参阅:
    Engagelab WhatsApp API
